FFT energy

Source: R/fft.R
fft_energy.Rd

Fast Fourier Transform (FFT): energy

Usage

fft_energy(f)

Arguments

f

num. The Fourier coefficients.

Value

\(E\) the energy.

Details

On the other hand, the so-called Parseval formula gives the energy: $$|c_{0}|^{2} + \frac 1 2\sum_{n=1}^{\ell-1} |c_{n}|^{2} = \frac 1 T \int_{0}^{T} |s(t)|^{2}dt \simeq \frac 1 N \sum_{n=1}^{N} |S_{n}|^{2}$$

Examples


fft_rfft(hobo$t_hobo[1:(24 * 5)]) %>%
  fft_energy()
#> [1] 317.6476
